abstract: Bill Clinton concludes his role as honorary chancellor with for-profit college system Laureate International Universities, cutting ties shortly after Hillary Clinton kicked off her 2016 presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: The former president left his position as honorary chancellor for Laureate International Universities, part of a for-profit college industry that has drawn criticism over its students’ debt loads.

headline.main: Bill Clinton Ends Role With Chain of For-Profit Colleges
headline.print_headline: Bill Clinton Ends Role With Chain of Colleges

snippet: The former president left his position as honorary chancellor for Laureate International Universities, part of a for-profit college industry that has drawn criticism over its students’ debt loads....
